name: Monster Smash (Fox and Lion Games)
description:
Monster Smash!

In this Action Platformer you'll have a chance to battle age old monsters, such as mummies, vampires, demons, werewolves, harpies, and Frankenstein's monster, in a new way with a "unique" mechanic that automatically swaps out your weapons mid match to keep you on your toes.

W = Jump

A = left

D = right

SPACE = shoot/attack

P = pause (resume doesnt work, but you can quit this way)

CREDITS:

Programming, Design, Sound Effects: Jeff Minbiole

Art, Design: Lily Minbiole

Music: Dimension Lord - dimensionlord.newgrounds.com - dimensionlord9999@gmail.com

Various Sound Effects from freesound.org
